attributes.action: Keep lockdown and close borders until ill COVID cases hit 0 same as NEW ZELAND
attributes.additional_details: We want our life to go back to normal. Sort our country out before worrying about the rest of the world. We have lost far too many lives. The tier systems do not work we have tried this twice and failed with huge spikes in cases. This is the sensible thing to do harsh lockdown of our country it’s been proven by others this works
attributes.background: Keep the UK in lockdown until there are no cases. Keep borders closed to other countries with dangerous COVID strands. Offer 2 weeks self funded isolation with proof of COVID negative tests for people wanting to enter. Follow New Zealand and Australia rules. Get our life back to normal
